resources.string:
Clare Chen, an industrial designer from the United States, and an aunt surrounded by nephews and nieces, finds it very valuable and interesting of children\'s innocence and all their devilish acts. Inspired by day to day interactions and observation of the little angels, CC products are easily relatable and can always put a smile on your face.
Forming as an extension of the designer's practical design and out of the box thinking, CC products are "simple but not simple". Everything is made to bring practicality, convenience, and better childhood stories for every baby and their families
